title: Boundary-guided Contrastive Learning for Semi-supervised Medical Image Segmentation
details: Y Yang, J Zhuang, G Sun, R Wang, J Su - IEEE Transactions on Medical Imaging, 2025
abstract: Semi-supervised learning methods, compared to fully supervised learning, offer significant potential to alleviate the burden of manual annotations on clinicians. By leveraging unlabeled data, these methods can aid in the development of medical …
